data.title: El Salvador Buys 21 More Bitcoins to Celebrate 21st Day, Year, Century
data.description: El Salvador, the country which made bitcoin legal tender, has purchased 21 more bitcoins to celebrate “the last 21st day of the year 21 of the 21st century,” President Nayib Bukele announced. The country has bought about 1,391 bitcoins altogether. El Salvador Buys More Bitcoins El Salvador’s President Nayib Bukele announced Tuesday that his country […]
data.author: Kevin Helms

data.title: GensoKishi prepares for early-stage investors and partners up with TrustPad
data.description: GensoKishi Online partners up with the first decentralized multi-chain fundraising platform, TrustPad, to take full advantage of the boosted marketing ahead of the iconic game’s token IDO.

data.title: Publicly-Traded Bitcoin Miners Have Been Outperforming The Bitcoin Price
data.description: Four publicly-traded bitcoin mining companies have outperformed the price of bitcoin since 2020 for a few key reasons.

data.title: Avalanche ($AVAX) Starts Trading on Kraken as on-Chain Activity Skyrockets
data.description: The native token of the Avalanche network, $AVAX, has started trading on cryptocurrency exchange Kraken, one of the largest cryptocurrency trading platforms in the world. The listing comes after AVAX’s price exploded this year and its adoption keeps on growing. In its listing announcement, Kraken detailed that AVAX will be tradable against the USD and […]

data.title: CryptoCom Buys an Ad Space For The Super Bowl 2022 As Its Last Major Business Move of the Year
data.description: Crypto.com could have paid over $6 million for 30 seconds of publicity in the Super Bowl 2022, the country's most popular sports event.

data.title: Jack Dorsey and Elon Musk Raise Concerns Over Web3 as Skepticism About Ownership Grows
data.description: Former Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey has ignited a debate about web3 after Tesla CEO Elon Musk criticized it. data.title: Shiba Inu Civil War Erupts As Former Promoter Calls Project a Scam
data.description: A Shiba Inu (SHIB) civil war erupted on Tuesday as a former promoter and supposed SHIB whale dramatically turned on one of its project leads, the pseudonymous Shytoshi Kusama. The post Shiba Inu Civil War Erupts As Former Promoter Calls Project a Scam appeared first on BeInCrypto.

data.title: Ethereum Rival Terra (LUNA) Surges to New All-Time High After Becoming Second-Largest Blockchain by Total Value Locked
data.description: Ethereum challenger Terra (LUNA) is rallying to new all-time highs just after the large-cap altcoin hit a crucial milestone. New data from DeFi Llama, an analytics platform focused on decentralized finance (DeFi) and non-fungible tokens (NFTs), shows that Terra has overtaken Binance Smart Chain to become the second-largest blockchain by total value locked. Terra is […] The post Ethereum Rival Terra (LUNA) Surges to New All-Time High After Becoming Second-Largest Blockchain by Total Value Locked appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
